title: Usb preferences chat closed
content: After looking for why I can't change "USB controlled by", I am now wondering why it says chat is closed yet showed hours of operation to be from 12:00pm to 11:59am 7 days a week and it's 3:08 eastern time. Is this degenerative technology so that I buy a Pixel 5. Because this guarantees I won't after being on this train since early Nexus. Those other guys sure do have a lot of stock android devices out there. Talk to me Google
